values: To exhibit is to show something so that people can go look at it.
My painting will be exhibited at the fair.
vt. 显示；展览；提出（证据等）
n. 展览品；证据；展示会
vi. 展出；开展览会
时态:exhibited, exhibiting, exhibits形容词:exhibitory
